name: Section
desc: See the fields returned by the section endpoints.

items.name: createdAt
items.desc: The date and time this section was created.

items.name: id
items.desc: The unique identifier of the specified section.

items.name: isDefault
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this is the default section for the channel.

items.name: modifiedAt
items.desc: The date and time this section was last modified.

items.name: shareUrl
items.desc: The URL of the channel in which this section appears.
